private: 👋🏻 Hi there! 💭 Groups Guard Bot is the most complete bot to help you manage your Groups easily and safely. ❓ Just press the 📚 Commands button below to see all the commands of the bot or hit /help
group:
Hello, i'm Guards Bot!

To discover my functions, please start a conversation with me.
info_page: • Groups Guard Bot 🔖 Bot version: {version} (736) 🧑🏼‍💻 Developer: @vionite Groups Guard is a bot developed in Python3 and using Pyrogram as the framework with sql as the database.
support_info_text:
• The Bot support information.

We have an official Group & Channel for this bot support. You can ask for help/support of this bot there, and then the Group staff will guide you with your problem.

💬 Group: @VeezSupportGroup
📣 News: @levinachannel

We will be happy to assist you in using the available features or configuring this bot within your group.
